definition: (archaic) wooden or metal token of authority/(fig.) decree/directive/(computing) token
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: Tokens can be created by a time trigger, which is the default.
sentences.chinese: 令牌可由時間觸發器創建，這是缺省設置。

sentences.english: The token must be known to the recipient out of band.
sentences.chinese: 令牌對於帶外的接收方必須是已知的。

sentences.english: It has scored a knockout win over token ring.
sentences.chinese: 它已取得了決定性的勝利，打倒了令牌環網。

sentences.english: The purse can have label, example 'Gold Movies purse'.
sentences.chinese: 令牌包可以帶有標籤，如“黃金電影包”。

sentences.english: The length of the device token as a two-byte integer value in network order.
sentences.chinese: 設備令牌的長度爲兩個字節的整數值的網絡字節序。

sentences.english: Token name for the translator within its package.
sentences.chinese: 程序包裏轉換程序的令牌名稱。

sentences.english: A cost in tokens is assigned to each programme offered in Tokens PPV mode.
sentences.chinese: 令牌費用被指配給令牌PPV模式所提供的各個程序。

sentences.english: A cost in tokens is assigned to each programme offered in Tokens PPV mode.
sentences.chinese: 令牌費用被指配給令牌PPV模式所提供的各個程序。

sentences.english: Custom token object propagation does not require the configuration of Trusted target realms.
sentences.chinese: 自定義令牌對象傳播不需要配置受信任的目標領域。

sentences.english: Attempts to retrieve the security token that is referenced in the specified object.
sentences.chinese: 嘗試檢索與指定的密鑰標識符子句相匹配的安全令牌。

sentences.english: How should the token be propagated?
sentences.chinese: 應該如何對令牌進行傳播？

sentences.english: The application of  asynchronous completion token also supports the efficient use of threads.
sentences.chinese: 異步完成令牌也能對線程的有效使用提供支持。

sentences.english: Cisco maps Token Ring to MAC-level broadcast addresses.
sentences.chinese: 思科地圖令牌環到Mac級廣播地址。

sentences.english: The tokens simply assert user privileges.
sentences.chinese: 該令牌僅僅斷言用戶的特權。

sentences.english: Iron mountain a hold firm this to make card, a see below, the facial expression greatly changes.
sentences.chinese: 鐵山一把抓住這令牌，一看之下，臉色大變。

sentences.english: A token bus network is very similar to a token ring network.
sentences.chinese: 令牌總線網與令牌環網非常相似。

definition: tiger tally (a two-piece object made in the shape of a tiger, used in ancient China as proof of authority. One half of a tally could be issued to a military officer and this would be matched with the other half when verification was required.)
official seal/imperial or royal seal/papal bull
Lingshi county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi
(Taoism) talisman in the form of a painting of symbols thought to have magical powers
